name: eslint-config-joelpurra
description: Opinionated shareable linting configuration for Javascript/Typescript. By and for Joel Purra.

scripts.lint: npm run --silent xo && npm run --silent lint:copyright
scripts.lint:copyright: find . -not \( -path './.git/*' -or -path './node_modules/*' \) -type f -iname '*.js' -print0 | xargs -0 grep -L 'This file is part of eslint-config-joelpurra' | sed 's/^/File is missing copyright notice: /'
